title: Ticket #5056: Support for multiple PBS schedulers
description:
We often get requests for better support of a "site CE" - that is, a single CE that can serve as a frontend for multiple PBS batch systems.

However, it doesn't seem the blahp can be configured for this. If possible, condor-g ought to specify which PBS server to use - and the blahp to utilize this information.
creator: bbockelm
